includedAssets.title: Doubt
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU team investigate a serial killer targeting women on a college campus. But they hit a brick wall when another woman is murdered after they arrest their suspect.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU hunt a killer targeting women on a college campus, but hit a wall when a woman is killed while their suspect is in custody.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU team investigate a serial killer targeting women on a college campus. But they hit a brick wall when another woman is murdered after they arrest their suspect.

includedAssets.title: In Name and Blood
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - In Name and Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: Hotch requests a transfer, Prentiss resigns and Gideon is missing, leaving the team three people short as they track a serial killer who abducts women.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hotch requests a transfer, Prentiss resigns and Gideon is missing, leaving the team three short as they track a serial killer who abducts women.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hotch requests a transfer, Prentiss resigns and Gideon is missing, leaving the team three people short as they track a serial killer who abducts women.

includedAssets.title: Scared to Death
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU travels to Portland to assist local authorities in investigating the disappearances of people who are new to the city and have no strong social ties.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU travels to Portland to investigate the disappearances of people who are new to the city and have no strong social ties.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU travels to Portland to assist local authorities in investigating the disappearances of people who are new to the city and have no strong social ties.

includedAssets.title: Children of the Dark
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep4 - Children of the Dark
includedAssets.synopsis: When home invasions involve the murder of entire families, the BAU is called to Denver to identify the killers who were possibly abused while in care.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When home invasions involve the murder of entire families, the BAU is called to Denver to identify the killers who were possibly abused while in care.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When home invasions involve the murder of entire families, the BAU is called to Denver to identify the killers who were possibly abused while in care.

includedAssets.title: Seven Seconds
includedAssets.synopsis: When a child is abducted from a local mall the BAU are forced to shut down the area in order to profile the potential suspects at the scene.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a child is abducted from a local mall the BAU are forced to shut down the area in order to profile the potential suspects at the scene.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a child is abducted from a local mall the BAU are forced to shut down the area in order to profile the potential suspects at the scene.

includedAssets.title: About Face
includedAssets.synopsis: Hotchner and the team find themselves on the trail of a murderer who posts 'Missing' posters of his victims shortly before killing them.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hotchner and the team find themselves on the trail of a murderer who posts 'Missing' posters of his victims shortly before killing them.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hotchner and the team find themselves on the trail of a murderer who posts 'Missing' posters of his victims shortly before killing them.

includedAssets.title: Identity
includedAssets.synopsis: When one half of a serial killing duo is caught and commits suicide, the team must race to track down his cohort and save the victim.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When one half of a serial killing duo is caught and commits suicide, the team must race to track down his cohort and save the victim.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When one half of a serial killing duo is caught and commits suicide, the team must race to track down his cohort and save the victim.

includedAssets.title: Lucky
includedAssets.synopsis: A cannibalistic serial killer causes Morgan to question his faith. Meanwhile, Garcia meets her perfect man but their date has an unexpected ending...

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A cannibalistic serial killer causes Morgan to question his faith. Meanwhile, Garcia meets her perfect man but their date has an unexpected ending...

includedAssets.title: Penelope
includedAssets.synopsis: As Garcia fights for her life, the team carry on the search for her attacker. But could it be someone closer to home than first imagined?

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Garcia fights for her life, the team carry on the search for her attacker. But could it be someone closer to home than first imagined?

includedAssets.title: True Night
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU and local authorities in Los Angeles investigate a series of brutal serial killings that appear to involve a famous comic book artist.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU and local authorities in Los Angeles investigate a series of brutal serial killings that appear to involve a famous comic book artist.

includedAssets.title: Birthright
includedAssets.synopsis: A series of murders in rural Virginia have the BAU team investigating a link between the killing spree and a similar case two decades ago.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A series of murders in rural Virginia have the BAU team investigating a link between the killing spree and a similar case two decades ago.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A series of murders in rural Virginia have the BAU team investigating a link between the killing spree and a similar case two decades ago.

includedAssets.title: 3rd Life
includedAssets.synopsis: When a murderer abducts two victims and kills one, the team faces a race against time to identify the killer before he can complete his mission.

includedAssets.title: Limelight
includedAssets.synopsis: The team travel to Philadelphia to investigate a series of murders linked to the contents of a self-storage unit purchased at an auction.

includedAssets.title: Damaged
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU team join Rossi on a trip to Indianapolis to continue his investigation into the two unsolved murders that have plagued him for 20 years.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU team join Rossi on a trip to Indianapolis to continue his investigation into the two unsolved murders that have plagued him for 20 years.

includedAssets.title: A Higher Power

includedAssets.title: Elephant's Memory
includedAssets.synopsis: The team profiles a serial killer in a small Texas town after responding to the murders of a teenage boy and his girlfriend.

includedAssets.title: In Heat
includedAssets.synopsis: The team travels to Miami to catch a serial killer believed to have a conflicted sexual identity, which plays a part in his choice of victims.

includedAssets.title: The Crossing
includedAssets.synopsis: The team must find a stalker who has crossed state lines to pursue a woman with whom he's obsessed. Meanwhile, Hotch and Rossi assist in a murder case.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team must find a stalker who has crossed state lines to pursue a woman with whom he's obsessed. Meanwhile, Hotch and Rossi assist in a murder case.

includedAssets.title: Tabula Rasa
includedAssets.synopsis: A serial killer case is reopened when the suspected murderer wakes up from a four-year coma and claims he doesn't remember committing any crimes.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A serial killer case is reopened when the suspected murderer wakes up from a four-year coma and claims he doesn't remember committing any crimes.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A serial killer case is reopened when the suspected murderer wakes up from a four-year coma and claims he doesn't remember committing any crimes.

includedAssets.title: Lo-Fi
includedAssets.synopsis: A series of murders with no apparent pattern to tie the crimes together takes the team to New York where they must determine if it's the work of a serial killer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A series of murders with no apparent pattern takes the team to New York where they must determine if it's the work of a serial killer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A series of murders with no apparent pattern to tie the crimes together takes the team to New York where they must determine if it's the work of a serial killer.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Big changes are afoot for the BAU in season three, as their unique skills become increasingly crucial to apprehending America’s most dangerous serial killers. Mandy Patinkin, Thomas Gibson, Paget Brewster and Joe Mantegna star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Changes are afoot for the BAU in season three, as they battle America’s most dangerous killers. Mandy Patinkin, Paget Brewster and Joe Mantegna star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Big changes are afoot for the BAU in season three, as their unique skills become increasingly crucial to apprehending America’s most dangerous serial killers. Mandy Patinkin, Thomas Gibson, Paget Brewster and Joe Mantegna star.

includedIn.title: Criminal Minds
includedIn.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, a team of elite psychological profilers, travel America aiding local police by getting inside suspects’ heads.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
